message: Let's be fair, Bob.  I take a bit more to start, but we both get a good deal.
I'm feeling generous, Alice, but let's be realistic. This round only.
Okay Bob, let's split the difference from my first offer.  Time is running out!
Alice, this is a fair deal.  Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
Bob, we're getting close!  I'm coming down, you're going up... let's end this before we both lose out.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take the deal!
